name: United-Guardian, Inc.
description: United-Guardian, Inc. is a diverse company specializing in the development and manufacturing of a wide range of products, primarily for the healthcare and personal care industries. Established in 1942, UGP has built a reputation for its innovative approach to product development, focusing on high-quality formulations and effective solutions. The company's product lines include pharmaceuticals, personal care products, and industrial products. United-Guardian's pharmaceutical division develops and markets prescription and over-the-counter medications, with a strong emphasis on quality and regulatory compliance. Their personal care products feature a variety of cosmetics and skincare formulations that cater to both consumers and professional markets. Additionally, the company manufactures specialty lubricants and other industrial products that serve various applications across different sectors. With a commitment to research and development, UGP continuously seeks to innovate and expand its product offerings, ensuring that it meets the evolving needs of its clients and the market. The company operates from its headquarters in Hauppauge, New York, and has a dedicated team focused on providing superior customer service and support. United-Guardian’s mission is to maintain its standing as a reliable partner in the industries it serves, while promoting health, wellness, and efficiency through its products.
